  • Uses of LumpingModelInterface in neqsim.thermo.characterization

    Classes in neqsim.thermo.characterization that implement LumpingModelInterface
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    LumpingModel.NoLumpingModel
    NoLumpingModel ddoes not distribute pseudo components plus fractions.
    class 
    LumpingModel.PVTLumpingModel
    PVTLumpingModel distributes the pseudo components into equal weight fractions starting with the plus fractions.
    class 
    LumpingModel.StandardLumpingModel
    StandardLumpingModel distributes the pseudo components into equal weight fractions starting with the first TBP fraction in the fluid.
